descriptionHtml:
`````````````````````````````````
 HQ 2048 TEXTURES DADRIC WEPONS
`````````````````````````````````
This mod is aimed to improve the various wepons of skyrim. to improve there visual quality and add very detailed.complety new re-coloured hq textures to the world of skyrim. over time this mod will grow and will eventual be made so that all the weapons in skyrim are.Visual stunning and unique in there own way.
 
``````````
FOR NOW
``````````
for now this is the first version of this mod. it features 4 of the dedric wepons (see pics ) please let me no what u think and leave ur ideas in comments section or pm me. consider this a \"TEST\" version and then if u guys like it i will continue to work on this mod with friends: will still work on it reguardless. but i like to know ur guys opinion

``````````````````````
UPDATES/FUTURE IDEAS
``````````````````````
:I will be regular updating  the mods and they will be named \" 2048x Wepon Textures by GameNinjaPro....... corsponding to the weapon names. 

: we are also working on a \"ARMOR VERSION\" of this mod to. so keep an eye out for that :)

`````````````````
INSTALLATION/SETUP
````````````````````
place texture file in ur main skyrim directory or use NMM too install :)

````````
CREDITS
````````
All credit go to bethesda for this wonderful game :)
author: GameNinjaPro
